body:
I tried installing perl via spack using the following commands:

`spack install perl %gcc@5.4.0`
or
`spack install perl %gcc@7.3.0`

note: I had the appropriate gcc modules loaded and was
using an interactive session with 32 cores.

It looks like the configuration is successful but an error occurs during the build stage:
```
Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
```

I receive the following error:
```
Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j32'
```



OS info:
```
LSB Version:	n/a
Distributor ID:	CentOS
Description:	CentOS Linux release 7.4.1708 (Core) 
Release:	7.4.1708
Codename:	Core
```
title: Installation issue: perl
